name: PhiShield Skin Candy 50pcs
short_description: SkinCandy is the cream containing the best features of both synthetic and natural components equally. Bee wax, with its quality to regulate oiling of the skin, enables application to all skin types.Combination of essential oils accelerates skin recovery, while synthetic oils keep the skin moisture.
long_description: The product does not contain water and thus does not contain any preservatives. Legally, each cosmetic product has to have an expiration date and the packaging fulfils legal requirements, although this is a product of unlimited shelf life. Instructions for use are listed on the packaging. The product is available in monodose packaging and it is intended to be given to the clients for home care use.net weight: 1g
